title: Vampire's Moon
description: The shadow of the Vampire Prince and his legion of ghouls darkened the tiny village high in the mountains of Rumania. Far from civilization, the Vampire Prince held sway over the superstitious peasants. They helped him lure two visiting American girls into his bat-infested lair. The girls didn't believe in vampires. By the time they began to believe, it was too late.
author: Peter Saxon
